channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Binance Australia got 12 hours' notice before it was debanked, says exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Binance Australia head Ben Rose claimed the exchange got less than a day's warning from its payments partner before it was "cut off" from the local banking system in May.

item.title: Robinhood to axe 7% of full-time staff in latest round of layoffs: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Roughly 150 full-time employees are being laid off, according to internal company messages.

item.title: Yes, the Secret Service has an NFT collection, and no, it’s not for sale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Agents from the U.S. Secret Service San Francisco Field Office have answered a burning question about its NFT collection. What does it do?

item.title: Crypto scams are going to ramp up with the rise of AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Roemer
item.description: Remember HarvestKeeper, the AI project that scammed users for $1 million? You can expect similar AI-based scams to soar over the next couple of years.

item.title: Swiss central bank announces plans for wholesale CBDC pilot with ‘real money’: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Thomas Jordan, head of the Swiss National Bank, announced the project at a conference in Zurich; bank still feels “prudent” about a retail CBDC, though.

item.title: Price analysis 6/26: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: An onslaught of Bitcoin ETF applications could help BTC price find long-lasting support at the $30,000 level.

item.title: US House bans members from using all chatbots except ChatGPT Plus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The ban comes less than a week after the House proposed a bill to create a federal artificial intelligence commission.

item.title: Judge denies motion from Binance regarding allegedly ‘misleading’ SEC statements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legal teams for Binance, Binance.US and CZ filed a motion for the court to order the SEC to comply with “applicable rules of conduct” following allegedly misleading statements.

item.title: What is generative AI?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Generative AI leverages large data sets and sophisticated models to mimic human creativity and produce new images, music, text and more.

item.title: FTX has recovered $7B in assets so far, has almost $2B to go to cover misappropriations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Tracing funds is highly challenging, according to the FTX Debtors’ second interim report, and there is no doubt that that was by design.

item.title: US lawmaker calls for info from Treasury and SEC on crypto market structure bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Rep. Maxine Waters gave Janet Yellen and Gary Gensler a deadline of June 30 to respond to her requests on the “Digital Asset Market Structure” bill proposed by Republican lawmakers.

item.title: Singapore central bank reports on tokenized asset network models after trials
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Three trial use cases have been completed as part of the project, and the report uses them as a “framework for consideration” of financial market infrastructure.

item.title: Optimism network transactions surged 67% following Bedrock upgrade — Nansen
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Optimism layer-2 network saw less than 300,000 transactions per day around the time of the upgrade, but this number increased to over 500,000 afterward.

item.title: Crypto investment products see largest weekly inflow since July 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: CoinShares’ latest weekly inflow report shows a substantial increase in investor appetite for digital asset investment products, with Bitcoin leading the rally.

item.title: How to use DeFi the right way — This latest guide can help
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: This latest report is a guide to help the next generation of cryptocurrency users and veterans alike in the ways of decentralized finance.

item.title: Bitcoin surfs $30K as traders hope US trading will boost BTC price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price performance goes sideways, but Bitcoin bulls retain $30,000 as support after the weekly close.

item.title: BTS: Revisiting the ‘buy $1 worth of Bitcoin’ video 10 years later
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Davinci Jeremie believes that while many people missed out on the opportunity to buy Bitcoin 10 years ago, it’s not too late to get into crypto.

item.title: Venture capital financing in crypto, explained
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anatol Hooper
item.description: Venture capital firms invest in early-stage startups to fuel innovation, growth and technological advancements within the crypto ecosystem.

item.title: Breaking down the ongoing token impersonation scams with DeFi execs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Tres Finance co-founder Tal Zackon warned businesses not to use explorers when tracking their finances.

item.title: Game developers’ role in elevating Web3 gaming — Breaking the stigma
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Maksym Illiashenko
item.description: By focusing on these elements, game developers can elevate Web3 games and change the stigma surrounding them. It's all about striking that perfect balance.

item.title: Coinbase Credit lends Hut 8 $50M to support Bitcoin treasury
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The loan will help Hut 8 maintain its dynamic Bitcoin treasury management strategy going into the halving, CEO Jaime Leverton said.

item.title: How security, education and regulation can mitigate rising crypto scams
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Cybersecurity experts say the crypto industry is a target for bad actors because it is a new technology that is rapidly evolving and growing.

item.title: zkSync unveils new network of ‘Hyperchains’ — Testnet by end of year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: zkSync Era’s new ZK Stack will use recursive scaling and “hyperchains” to create an ecosystem of interoperable protocols and sovereign chains.

item.title: How could the Chinese economic crisis impact Bitcoin and crypto?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how China’s economic weakness and Turkey’s interest rate hikes could impact the cryptocurrency market.

item.title: The importance of ‘ghost rate’ in gauging meaningful adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mark Soares
item.description: Ghost rate is not just a metric; it's imperative for brands seeking to tap into the transformative potential of blockchain technology.

item.title: HSBC rolls out cryptocurrency services in Hong Kong: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Three crypto ETFs listed on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong are now reportedly available for trading at Hong Kong’s largest bank.

item.title: Crypto adoption in Cyprus beefed up by Bybit license approval
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Following Binance’s departure from Cyprus, Bybit strengthens the island’s crypto ecosystem after acquiring an operating license.

item.title: Binance reverses decision to delist privacy coins in Europe
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Binance said it revised operations to comply with EU standards and delist several privacy coins after carefully considering feedback from the community and several projects.

item.title: The best blockchain “does not exist” — Cardano Foundation exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Mel McCann, vice president of engineering at the Cardano Foundation, argued that there are different use cases for various blockchains.

item.title: BTC price up, fundamentals down? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin begins an “important” week with $30,000 still intact at the weekly close.
